methods.name: public Builder addMatchingUsage(@AttributeUsage int usage)
methods.comment:
* Only capture audio output with the given {@link AudioAttributes}. * *

If called multiple times, will capture audio output that matches any of the given * attributes. * * @throws IllegalStateException if called in conjunction with * {@link #excludeUsage(int)}.

methods.name: public Builder addMatchingUid(int uid)
methods.comment:
* Only capture audio output by app with the matching {@code uid}. * *

If called multiple times, will capture audio output by apps whose uid is any of the * given uids. * * @throws IllegalStateException if called in conjunction with {@link #excludeUid(int)}.

methods.name: public Builder excludeUsage(@AttributeUsage int usage)
methods.comment:
* Only capture audio output that does not match the given {@link AudioAttributes}. * *

If called multiple times, will capture audio output that does not match any of the * given attributes. * * @throws IllegalStateException if called in conjunction with * {@link #addMatchingUsage(int)}.

methods.name: public Builder excludeUid(int uid)
methods.comment:
* Only capture audio output by apps that do not have the matching {@code uid}. * *

If called multiple times, will capture audio output by apps whose uid is not any of * the given uids. * * @throws IllegalStateException if called in conjunction with {@link #addMatchingUid(int)}.

methods.name: public AudioPlaybackCaptureConfiguration build()
methods.comment:
* Builds the configuration instance.
         *
         * @throws UnsupportedOperationException if the parameters set are incompatible.
